text: Ra hamile musasita 30 ratako vacana diyaum ani hamile 10 rata atirikta badha'era pura garyaum. Yasaprakara unako palanakartako samaya 40 rata bha'ihalyo. Ra musale aphno bha'i harunasita bhane, ‘‘mero pachadi yiniharuko vyavastha mila'unu ra sudhara gardairahanu ra avyavastha utpanna garnevalaharuko margama nahindnu.’’
